subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Mardy Fish beat John Isner in the final at the Atlanta Tennis Championships for the second straight year, recording a 3-6, 7-6 (6), 6-2 victory.
snippet: Mardy Fish beat John Isner in the final at the Atlanta Tennis Championships for the second straight year, recording a 3-6, 7-6 (6), 6-2 victory.
